title: git clone --recursive https://github.com/caffe2/caffe2.git gives error that Eigen repository is not found.
body_html:
1. Installing caffe2 is being a nightmare now for me. Many methods follow cloning caffe2 which results in error that eigen repository is not found. I came to know that it has been moved to another place called eigen git mirror. So how to proceed now as it not able to find it by cloning caffe2.

  2. When I follow builing from source method i am getting error in make like this

  3. I also tried to use conda installation but after importing . when I test with 'from caffe2.python import core' getting this message:

WARNING:root:This caffe2 python run does not have GPU support. Will run in
CPU only mode.
WARNING:root:Debug message: No module named caffe2_pybind11_state_hip
CRITICAL:root:Cannot load caffe2.python. Error: /home/g008kaaraan/pytorch/
build/caffe2/python/caffe2_pybind11_state.so: undefined symbol: _ZN6caffe2
24OptimizationPassRegistryB5cxx11Ev

I am doing this on Google cloud environment.
Ubunto 16.04 python 2.7

I am frustated now please suggest any valid method to do this.
body_text:
Installing caffe2 is being a nightmare now for me. Many methods follow cloning caffe2 which results in error that eigen repository is not found. I came to know that it has been moved to another place called eigen git mirror. So how to proceed now as it not able to find it by cloning caffe2.


When I follow builing from source method  i am getting error in make  like this


I also tried to use conda installation but after importing . when I test with 'from caffe2.python import core' getting this message:


WARNING:root:This caffe2 python run does not have GPU support. Will run in
CPU only mode.
WARNING:root:Debug message: No module named caffe2_pybind11_state_hip
CRITICAL:root:Cannot load caffe2.python. Error: /home/g008kaaraan/pytorch/
build/caffe2/python/caffe2_pybind11_state.so: undefined symbol: _ZN6caffe2
24OptimizationPassRegistryB5cxx11Ev
I am doing this on Google cloud environment.
Ubunto 16.04  python 2.7
I am frustated now please suggest any valid method to do this.
body:
1. Installing caffe2 is being a nightmare now for me. Many methods follow cloning caffe2 which results in error that eigen repository is not found. I came to know that it has been moved to another place called eigen git mirror. So how to proceed now as it not able to find it by cloning caffe2.

2. When I follow builing from source [method ](https://caffe2.ai/docs/getting-started.html?platform=ubuntu&configuration=compile) i am getting error in make  like [this](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/9181)

3. I also tried to use [conda](https://caffe2.ai/docs/getting-started.html?platform=ubuntu&configuration=prebuilt) installation but after importing . when I test with 'from caffe2.python import core' getting this message:

**WARNING:root:This caffe2 python run does not have GPU support. Will run in
 CPU only mode.
WARNING:root:Debug message: No module named caffe2_pybind11_state_hip
CRITICAL:root:Cannot load caffe2.python. Error: /home/g008kaaraan/pytorch/
build/caffe2/python/caffe2_pybind11_state.so: undefined symbol: _ZN6caffe2
24OptimizationPassRegistryB5cxx11Ev**





I am doing this on Google cloud environment. 
Ubunto 16.04  python 2.7

I am frustated now please suggest any valid method to do this.
